channel.title: Series on Chapel Language Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Series on Chapel Language Blog

item.title: NetCDF in Chapel
item.description: This series describes the use of Chapel’s interoperability features to read NetCDF files into distributed arrays.

item.title: Advent of Code 2022
item.description: This series is an introduction to the Chapel language through solutions to the first twelve days of Advent of Code 2022.

item.title: 7 Questions for Chapel Users
item.description: This series interviews users of Chapel about their experiences with the language.

item.title: Navier-Stokes in Chapel
item.description: A series focused on scientific computing in Chapel using steps from the Lorena A. Barba group’s 12 steps to Navier-Stokes tutorial.

item.title: GPU Programming in Chapel
item.description: This series showcases Chapel’s support for vendor-neutral GPU programming.
